mapper.select: SELECT masterseq, title, imgurl FROM BOOKINFO WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{searchStr}||'%' OR author LIKE '%'||#{searchStr}||'%' ORDER BY title

SELECT masterseq, title, imgurl FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, S.masterseq, S.title, S.imgurl FROM bookinfo S WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{searchStr}||'%' OR author LIKE '%'||#{searchStr}||'%' ORDER BY masterseq ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
